title: Nostalgic Dive Into the Advent of Gaming
itunes:title: Nostalgic Dive Into the Advent of Gaming
description:
Journalist and Author David Kushner, discusses his book Easy to Learn, Difficult to Master: Pong, Atari, and the Dawn of the Video Game.

Hosts: Tim Stenovec and Mike Regan. Producer: Paul Brennan.  

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
